name: nfa04/sandyphp
description: SandyPHP is a sandboxing SandyPHP is a sandboxing library for PHP, written in PHP. It allows fine-grained control over every aspect of the script to be run. In the future it should also support generating a safe-to-run version of any given PHP-script.  library for PHP, written in PHP.
